description: This file sets up an AI agent with knowledge base, storage, and model configurations, and includes a main execution block to load the knowledge base and generate a response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with knowledge, model, and storage configurations.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Handles embedding generation using OpenAI models.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Manages knowledge base loaded from URLs.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Claude language model from Anthropic.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in a SQLite database.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints the agent's response to a question.
